file_content.text: We can speak later. Let's stick to the task at hand.
Ha! Defeated! Defeated!
Why did you not come for me, Tulak? Why have you allowed your servant to be reduced to this?
Fine, little one. In my great weakness, you have defeated me, so I must serve you--this is the law that binds me. But you are not my master.
I am your master. Get used to it.
Denial won't change anything.
Fine. Then let's go.
Let's leave this place.
You will obey.
As you say, little one.
But someday I will regain my strength.
Ha! All the world conspires to mock me! Haha!
Tulak Hord! I waited for you. I did everything you said! And this is what you send me?
Ha! Fate is cruel to me, little one. But not as cruel as it is to you. You have made a terrible mistake.
These were the instructions Zash gave me. I am to free you and you will take me to the map in the final chamber of the tomb.
No, this is right.
Don't resist.
You don't sound exactly sane.
You're crazy.
No. Ha! No, little one. I am perfectly sane. The world mocks me, and I laugh with it.
I am Khem Val, servant of Tulak Hord, who was called Lord of Hate, Master of the Gathering Darkness, Dark Lord of the Sith.
Together, Tulak Hord and I devoured our enemies at the battles of Yn and Chabosh and brought the entire Dromund system to its knees. And now I await his return.
I hate to be the one to break it to you, but Tulak Hord is dead.
I don't know how to say it...
Dead? My lord, why didn't you come for me? I would have died with you--no, I would have slain death itself....
What?
No--what time have I awakened in--that my master's exploits are no longer remembered by the Sith? Tulak, my lord, are you so long gone as to be forgotten?
As for you, you should not have come here.
Shut up. You're my slave now.
Silence, monster.
No. You have awakened me, but I do not answer to you.
You have made a grave mistake waking me.
For I hunger--and I will devour you!
If I had not seen it, I would not have believed it was true. My master is dead, and all his works are buried in sand.
You are not my master.
Ahhhh
